name: Avoid using variable without testing them for initialisation (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Sections that do not test variables before using them.
output:
"This report lists all the Sections using variables without testing them.

rationale: Using variables without testing them for initialization is very risky because it could cause an application crash, as such, this practice should be avoided.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the use of non-tested variables. Instead try to use the the 'isset' (for variables) or 'defined' (for constants) functions.
